p: Overall scale selection pressure analysis showed that ɷ values of all H7 before 2013, all novel H7N9 AIVs, human-derived H7N9 AIVs and avian-derived H7N9 AIVs were 0.26, 0.19, 0.23, and 0.16, respectively, while these values of N9 were 0.29, 0.19, 0.21, and 0.13, respectively. All ɷ values on the overall scale were < 1.
